request_id.description: Optional correlation ID for tracing across systems.

version.description: Optional requested tool version (semver string or tag).

params.description: Tool-specific parameters. This schema intentionally does not constrain param shape.

artifacts.description: Optional artifact references supplied as inputs to this call. Tools may ignore if not applicable.

preferences.description: Optional execution preferences that are not tool semantics.

deterministic.description: Hint that caller prefers deterministic behavior (no timestamps, no network).

max_output_bytes.description: Optional soft limit for output size.

time.description: Optional RFC3339 timestamp. Omit for strict determinism.
